title: The effect of oral probiotics in the last trimester on the human milk and infant gut microbiotas at six months postpartum: A randomized controlled trial
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Guangyu Ma, Yimi Li, Kian Deng Tye, Ting Huang, Xiaomei Tang, Huijuan Luo, Dongju Wang, Juan Zhou, Zhe Li, Xiaomin Xiao
